## This data is tracking the content students are recommended on their Tiktok For You Page (FYP) and how they interact with it

You need to change the contents of this Rmd! Replace the R code and markdown give below in this template document.

```{r}
library("readr")
logged_data <- read_csv("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vSbmJwPnUT0jBRw8-ad_CD1WahMCxP0Bmos7y-w2CH_2czQhkekLIjPj8U8Q-NZk7I1flE9XGWMVmu9/pub?output=csv")%>%
  rename(number_of_responses = 1,
    age = 2,
       hours_scrolling = 3,
       videos_that_appear = 4,
       videos_interacted_with = 5,
       how_tailored = 6,
       usage_duration = 7)

latest_data <- logged_data
glimpse(latest_data)

number_of_responses <- latest_data$hours_scrolling %>%
  length()

mean_hours_scrolling <- latest_data$hours_scrolling %>%
  mean() %>%
  round(1)

paste0("The mean hours spent scrolling on TikTok's FYP reported by the ", number_of_responses, " students who completed the survey was ", mean_hours_scrolling, ".")


latest_data <- latest_data %>%
  mutate(how_tailored = as.factor(how_tailored))

latest_data %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(y = hours_scrolling,
               fill = how_tailored)) +
  labs(title = "Hours scrolling the TikTok FYP compared to how tailored each student believes their FYP is",
       x = "Number of students",
       y = "Rating",
       caption = "Source: STATS 220 survey S125")+
  theme_minimal()


latest_data %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(y = usage_duration,
               fill = how_tailored)) +
  labs(title = "How long a student has used Tiktok compared to how tailored each student believes their FYP is",
       x = "Number of students",
       y = "Rating",
       caption = "Source: STATS 220 survey S125")+
  theme_minimal()


latest_data %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(y = age,
               fill = videos_interacted_with)) +
  labs(title = "How old is a student compared to what kind of videos they interact with on their FYP",
       x = "Number of students",
       y = "Age group",
       caption = "Source: STATS 220 survey S125")+
  theme_minimal()
```
